DOC.detailed_description: The study design include three parallel phase II study , rule patient selection outcome assessment . In two study cisplatin-based doublet , dose-finding phase plan , subsequent cohort 6 patient treat increase dos cisplatin ( 50-60-70 mg/m² ) . Following phase , patient assign three study randomization procedure , reduce selection bias . Arm A : gemcitabine : Gemcitabine 1200 mg/m2 intravenously 2 hour ( 10 mg/m²/minute ) day 1 & 8 cycle , every 21 day , maximum 6 cycle . Arm B : cisplatin + vinorelbine : Vinorelbine 25 mg/m² day 1 & 8 , follow Cisplatin ( 50 60 70 mg/m² ) day 1 cycle , every 21 day , maximum 6 cycle . Arm C : cisplatin + gemcitabine : Gemcitabine 1000 mg/m2 , , day 1 & 8 , follow Cisplatin ( 50 60 70 mg/m² ) day 1 cycle , every 21 day , maximum 6 cycle .
